page.title: 05RECREATION IN OADBY
page.content: {Recreation in Oadby Many clubs are held after lessons are finished in Gartree High School,these are open to the pupils.They include dance,football,basketball and often matches against other schools are arranged.Ther are activities inside the gym and sports hall as well as outside. In the evening classes are held for adults_Keep Fit,Football for the Over 40's,Badminton,Yoga;there are many activities to choose from. In the summer months the tennis courts shared by Gartree High &Beauchamp College have their own club.It costs Â£5 to become a member then you can use the courts after 6.00pm. Over the Christmas holidays a ski-ing trip to the French Alps is organised by teh school.Non-skiers are firstly taken to the leicester dry ski-slopes.
